Utterance: Ami jani eta ososthikor. Karon eti ei therapyr moto chushe felaar moto thik kothao na pawar moto. Eti thik moto kichu korar moto na. Tai hyan, eti somporkhe kotha bola ososthikor karon eti ami jani na.
Amar indriyo hol je apni kichu bolar chesta korchen ebong tarpor apni praoy halo chhede diyechen.

Thik achhe, ami ki bishoye kotha bolar chesta korchi ebong ami jani na apni amar moto ar ki korte chan. Ami tomake bolechi ami bhalo nei. Ami therapyr baire kichu pachhi. Ami mone kori ami khub sposto korchi, kintu ami onuman korchi na.
Aponi ki amar upor rogg korchen?

Mane, ami raganvit bodh korchi je therapy kaj korche na. Jemon ami bolechi. Ami raganvit bodh korchi, ami je jaigay achi ekhono shei jaigayei achi. Jodi ami chesta korchi. Ami, thik moto anubhav korchi, ami sadharanbhabe birkot bodh korchi, apni janen?

Thik. Sutaraá¹…ga, apni janen, ami bujhte pari je apni sadharanbhabe birkot. Kintu tumi ki amar upor rogg korecho? Ami bolte chachi, amar anubhutite mone hocche apni ei muhurte amar upor rogg korchhen. Jodi tumi ho. Ami sotti ei ta somporkhe jante chai.

Well, ami bolte chachi, ami onuman korchi amar ekta onsho ache jeta ek tu moto moto. Hyan, ekta rogg. Je tumi amake sahajyokari no. Ami shekhane esechi karon ami bhalo bodh korte chhilam. Ebong hyan, ami bolte chachi, ami onuman korchi je ami raganvit bodh korchi je ami apnar kach theke ja pachhi tar moto noy jodi ami ja pawar chesta korchi. Tai
Hyan, apni amar kache sotti birkot lagche. Ei somporkhe amake bolte kemon lagche?
Eta kathin mone hoy. Ami bolte chachi, ami rogg korchhi bola kathin. Eti ekta anubhutir moto noy eti bola aramdayok jinis noy ba anubhav kora aramdayok jinis noy. Eti thik amar moto kore tole

Thik achhe, tai ami apnake khub jore dhakka dite chai. Tobe apni ki ososthikor birkotikor hower somoy eti somporkhe aro kichu bolte paren. Tai ami bolte chachi, ami bujhte pari je eti ososthikor. Ami bolte chaiteshi,

Eta emon kichu noy je ami sadharanotoma ke bolte chahi je ami tader upor reghe achi, tai mone hocche, amar mone hocche ami ekhon ekdhorone udvigno, emonki bolte chahi, je ami chai na apni bhabun ami sudhu she rokomoi. Eta apnar dosh moto. Eta thik bhalo lage je ami moto, je kichu ami sotti bolte anumit korchhi na.
Tai, ami bolte chachi, er kichu onsho mone hocche apni udvigno je ami anubhav korte jachi je apni amake dosharop korchen.

Sotti? Ami onuman kori. Ami eta korte chai na. Kintu hyan. Hyan. Ei rokom anubhav kora kathin. Amar mone hocche ami ei therapyte eka achi je, ami eshe chesta korchi ebong ami apnar kach theke kichu-i pachhi na. Thik achi, tai

Sotti guruttopurno shonachchhe, tai na? Mone hocche apni janen, eta bolo kathin. Kintu apni ki janen, apni rogg korchhen hoyto apni hotash bodh korchen? Tumi eka eka anubhav korcho. Hyan, apni ei bishe amar sathe kotha bolte paren na.
Hyan, sotti kathin mone hoy ebong ami shokkho hote chai.
Ami ekhono kichuta udvigno bodh korchi, kintu ami bolte chachi, ami mone kori je eti toh bhalo lage. Ami onuman kori je ami eti bolte chai ebong ami mone kori je eti sahayyo kore.
Thik achhe, tai asun onto eti sekhane aache. Thik.
